Articles.Content:
Good Evening Ladies and Gents, 

Having some issues, when I launch the game it always gets stuck attempting to load the part "Aeroponics" below is the ending of the KSP log something to do with textures though I am not positively sure what. 

Thanks in advance!

PartLoader: Compiling Part 'UmbraSpaceIndustries/Kolonization/Parts/OKS\_Aeroponics/OKS\_Aeroponics'

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

PartCompiler: Cannot replace texture as cannot find texture 'OKSDecal00\_GLOW' to replace

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

 at PartLoader.ReplaceTextures (UnityEngine.GameObject model, System.Collections.Generic.List`1 textureNames, System.Collections.Generic.List`1 newTextures) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at PartLoader.CompileModel (.UrlConfig cfg, .ConfigNode partCfg, Single scaleFactor, .AvailablePart partInfo) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at PartLoader.ParsePart (.UrlConfig urlConfig, .ConfigNode node) [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

 at PartLoader+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown="">:0 </filename>

(Filename: Line: -1)
